programme.title: Dulhan Hum Le Jayenge
programme.desc: Sapna is brought up by her three eccentric uncles, Bhola Nath, Prabhu Nath and Vicky Nath, after her parents' death. Prabhu is God-fearing and dedicates most of his time worshipping God, whereas Bhola is athletic and spends his time weightlifting. Vicky, on the other hand, is very lively and loves to dance. After Sapna has had enough of their possessive natures, she secretly takes a trip to Europe with a tour group. She meets Raja Oberoi on the trip and the two soon fall in love. They decide to get married when they return. Her uncles disapprove of her relationship with Raja because of an argument they had with Raja's father in the past. Raja doesn't give up and attempts to impress her uncles. (Film - Rom-Com)

programme.title: Amit Sahni Ki List
programme.desc: Ace comedian Vir Das stars as the eponymous Amit Sahni, a meticulous and quirky young man with an obsession to find the right girl according to his bucket-list. After suffering heartbreak at a young age, Amit prepares a list entailing all the qualities he would want in his future lover. Unable to find such a girl, Amit gets engaged to Mala (Vega Tamotia), a beautiful young girl who is Amit's polar opposite. While things are moving smoothly, Amit's life takes an unexpected turn when he meets Devika, a girl who ticks every checkbox in his list. (Film - Rom-Com)

programme.title: ABCD: Any Body Can Dance
programme.desc: Filled with foot-tapping numbers and mind-blowing dance sequences is 'ABCD: Anybody Can Dance', a dance film which witnesses ace choreographer Remo donning the role of director. Brilliant dancers like Prabhudheva and Ganesh Acharya team up with seasoned actors like Kay Kay Menon in this one-of-a-kind blockbuster which tracks the rise of a choreographer who trains people from the streets to take part in a professional dance competition. (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Waah! Tera Kya Kehna
programme.desc: Dilip and Ashish plot to prove that their brother, Raj, is mentally incompetent to inherit their father's property. However, when Raj's lookalike takes his place, their plans go up in smoke. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Once Upon Ay Time in Mumbai Dobaara!
programme.desc: Shoaib becomes the new mafia leader after killing his mentor, Sultan Mirza. He finds a protege in Aslam, but trouble ensues when they both fall in love with the same woman, Jasmine. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Lion King
programme.desc: Mufasa, the noble lion king of the Pride Lands of Africa, is killed trying to save his young son from a trap set by his evil brother Scar. He then declares himself king and tries to kill Simba. However, Simba escapes and grows up in the company of outcasts Timon and Pumbaa, a meerkat and warthog. Years later, Simba has a chance encounter with Nala the lioness who urges him to return to the pride and take his rightful place as the king. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Kaala Patthar
programme.desc: Vijay Singh is a disgraced former navy officer who is branded as a coward and forced to work at a coal mine out of guilt. However, he gets trapped with other miners after a flood hits them. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Golmaal 3
programme.desc: From the most celebrated director of action comedy, Rohit Shetty, comes another light-hearted, fun and mirthful instalment of the 'Golmaal' franchise which sees the return of Ajay Devgn, Kareena Kapoor and Arshad Warsi amidst the breathtaking locales of Goa where Geeta (Ratna Pathak Shah) and Pritam (Mithun Chakraborty) try to rekindle their old spark after several years, but to their despair, their children become the obstacles in their love story. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Deewar Man Of Power
programme.desc: Childhood friends Bujji and Chitti decide to meet after 12 years. Bujji, a gangster, attempts to murder Sivanna, not knowing that he is Chitti's brother. (Film - Action)

programme.title: R.I.P.D.
programme.desc: Bobby Hayes and his aide Nick Walker, who work as detectives for the Boston Police Department, steal gold while they are on duty. Bobby kills Nick so that he doesn't return the booty to the officials during a raid. In the afterlife, Nick is hired by Mildred Proctor, the director of Rest In Peace Department (R.I.P.D.), a group of deceased police officers. Nick is assigned the responsibility to fight against the renegade ghosts. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Croods
programme.desc: This animated 3D adventure film tells the story of the world's first family road trip where Grub, a caveman, treks to an unfamiliar world in search of a new home along with his family after their cave is destroyed in a natural disaster. Guy, a nomad, joins the family in their adventure and helps them cope up with the fear of the unknown. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Dragonball: Evolution
programme.desc: (Film - Action)

programme.title: Kingsman: The Secret Service
programme.desc: Gary 'Eggsy' Unwin, an unrefined but promising street kid, gets recruited and trained as an agent for a secret spy organisation. He goes through the organisation's gruelling training programme while a global threat emerges from an eccentric genius. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Maleficent: Mistress of Evil
programme.desc: Aurora rules over the kingdom of Moors and Maleficent, her adoptive mother, is its guardian. When Prince Philip proposes to Aurora, Maleficent disapproves of the union. Aurora then begins to question her family ties. But when Queen Ingrith, Philip's mother who hates the fairies of Moor, plots revenge, she finds herself in a soup. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Despicable Me 3
programme.desc: After being fired from the Anti-Villain League, Gru sets out to meet his long-lost twin, Dru, for the first time. But he is soon forced to team up with his brother to take down Balthazar Bratt, a former child star, whose obsession with his 80s character turns him into a supervillain. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Avengers: Age Of Ultron
programme.desc: The second instalment of the 'Avengers' franchise brings the superheroes back together and this time, the stakes are higher than ever. With a view to stop the world from fighting anymore, Tony Stark enlists Bruce Banner's help to create an artificial intelligence called Ultron. But Tony's habit of playing God will end up costing the world as Ultron's personality takes charge of a robot's body, manufacturing several more like himself to declare war on the human race. Iron Man, Hulk, Captain America, Thor, Hawkeye and Black Widow are joined by a trusted few as they take on this very dangerous villain. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Skyscraper

(Film - Action)

programme.title: Honey, I Shrunk the Kids
programme.desc: The film, which is a directorial debut of Joe Johnston, tells the story of an absent-minded inventor who leaves his latest creation, an electromagnetic shrinking machine, unattended in his attic. The machine shrinks his and his neighbour's kids to 1/4-th of an inch, when they accidentally trigger it. When the newly tiny youngsters are tossed out with the trash, they must survive the long journey across the lawn. (Film - Family)

programme.title: The Pacifier
programme.desc: Vin Diesel dons the role of an FBI agent who is allotted the most bizarre assignment of his life in this rib-tickling and enthralling film. Unable to save a brilliant scientist from enemy forces, Vin is tasked with protecting his family, which includes his wife, four children, an infant and a pet duck. Armed with sippers, baby carriers and his guns he must make sure he can don the role of 'The Pacifier' in the tumultuous course of events. (Film - Family)

programme.desc: Santiago always had a dream of playing professional soccer but couldn't do much about it. He started following his father's footsteps and started supporting the family, until a life changing opportunity strikes him. (Film - Drama)

programme.title: The Bourne Supremacy
programme.desc: Jason Bourne is forced to return to his old ways as an assassin when he is wrongly framed in a CIA operation. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Call of the Wild
programme.desc: Buck, a gentle and large dog, is kidnapped from his California home and shipped to the wilderness of Yukon. After being sold to Perrault, who runs a dog sled mail service, he gets introduced to a pack of other dogs led by Spitz, a Husky, and slowly becomes popular, much to the chagrin of Spitz. Meanwhile, he strikes an unlikely and beautiful friendship with John Thornton, a loner, who, eventually helps him discover his place in the world. (Film - Adventure)

programme.title: MasterChef Australia
programme.desc: The two teams must use the same ingredients, lemongrass for the entree, Jerusalem artichoke for the main and kumquats for the dessert, to secure immunity. (TV Show - Reality - Talent)

programme.title: Shanghai Knights
programme.desc: Jackie Chan and Owen Wilson reprise their roles as Chon and Roy and head to London to take revenge on the Chinese rebel who killed Chon's father. But during their pursuit, they stumble upon a dangerous conspiracy. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Pirates Of The Caribbean: Salazar's Revenge
programme.desc: (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Toy Story 2
programme.desc: When Woody is kidnapped by a greedy toy collector and is nowhere to be found, Buzz and his friends set out to rescue him. However, Woody gets tempted by the idea of becoming immortal in a museum. (Film - Animation)

His life takes an extraordinary turn as he is mixed up in a legal case out of the blue. Hilarity ensues as he deals with the Indian legal and criminal system in a way only a frustrated common Indian citizen can empathize with. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: The Mummy
programme.desc: In this reboot of the 'The Mummy' franchise, Sergeant Nick Morton and Corporal Chris Vail uncover the mummy of the betrayed Princess Ahmanet, who unleashes mayhem across London in a bid to reclaim her destiny. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Pearl Harbor
programme.desc: Rafe and Danny, played by the dashing Ben Affleck and handsome Josh Hartnett, are childhood friends. Both of them share a love for planes and grow up to be Air Force pilots. When one of the two dies in battle, the other is left to fill the void of his friend's absence and move on. A romantic encounter takes place post the sudden tragedy. Directed by Michael Bay, the movie was nominated for four Academy Awards including Best Sound and Original Song, sung by Diane Warren. The movie bagged an award for Best Sound Editing. (Film - War)

programme.title: Captain America: Civil War
programme.desc: The Avengers stand on opposite sides when world leaders try to interfere with their activities. With the two superhero factions--led by Captain America and Iron Man--pit against each other, are the Avengers doomed. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Percy Jackson: Sea Of Monsters
programme.desc: Percy Jackson, the son of Posedion, decides to uphold Thalia's sacrifice. Thalia had sacrificed herself to get the others into her camp and her father Zeus found another way for her to live by transforming her into a pine tree, creating a magical border around the camp so that no other half-blood would suffer from a fate as she did. For this, he embarks on a journey, with his friends Annabeth, Clarisse and half-brother, Tyson, to the Sea of Monsters to find the Golden Fleece which has the power to save their home and training ground, Camp Half-Blood. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Frozen
programme.desc: When the Snow Queen Elsa accidentally puts the kingdom in a state of infinite winter, Anna, her sister, teams up with Kristoff, an iceman, his loyal reindeer and Olaf, a snowman, to convince her to return and reverse the weather. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Johnny English Reborn
programme.desc: A possible assassination of the Chinese premier and a conspiracy involving the MI-7, KGB and the CIA force the bosses at MI-7 to recall their brave but unconventional agent, Johnny English, who after a failed mission is seeking a shot at redemption. (Film - Comedy)

Accompanied by a Chinese student and a Parisian lady, Hawk bears it all to emerge successful in this film, which is known to be the third highest grosser in China and also earned two Guinness World Records. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Beauty and the Beast
programme.desc: This live-action retelling of the Disney classic follows Belle, who has taken her father's place in the Beast's castle and befriended its enchanted servants. She soon discovers the reason behind the creature's frightful exterior and begins appreciating his true nature. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Pirates Of The Caribbean: At World's End
programme.desc: Director Gore Verbinski and his crew set sail into the third chapter of this surreal, action-packed series that narrates the adventures of Captain Jack Sparrow (Johnny Depp). This installation finds Captain Sparrow stuck in Davy Jones' locker after his encounter with the kraken. Now Elizabeth Swann (Keira Knightley) and Will Turner (Orlando Bloom) must team up with the notorious Captain Barbossa (Geoffrey Rush) and pirates from around the world to save Jack Sparrow and fight the evil East India Trading Company. (Film - Adventure)

programme.title: The Adventurers
programme.desc: Dan Cheung, an infamous thief, is imprisoned after he miscalculates a heist. When he is released five years later, Dan plans another heist with his old partner and a new recruit. However, Pierre, a French detective, is hot on his trail and tries to recruit Dan's ex-fiance to help bring him to justice. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Reign Of Fire
programme.desc: In the year 2020, the world has been ravaged by the dragons that were accidentally awakened from their slumber by humans. Now it is up to Quinn Abercromby (Christian Bale) and Denton Van Zan (Matthew McConaughey) to save mankind from annihilation. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Mulan
programme.desc: Popular stars Ming-Na, Eddie Murphy, Miguel Ferrer and BD Wong lend their voices to recount a unique Chinese tale of a girl who takes an untrodden path of masquerading as a man just to save her land from the evil invaders. On gauging that her ailing father is in no position to defend his territory, 'Mulan' decides to take his place and lead her army to victory, but an unexpected company awaits her. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Gali Gali Chor Hai
programme.desc: The everyday struggle of a common man in India against politics and corruption comes alive in this comedy flick. Bharat (Akshaye Khanna) is a full time cashier and part time local Ramleela actor who is living an ordinary life with his wife Nisha (Shriya Saran), a school teacher. His life takes an extraordinary turn as he is mixed up in a legal case out of the blue. Hilarity ensues as he deals with the Indian legal and criminal system in a way only a frustrated common Indian citizen can empathize with. (Film - Comedy)

programme.desc: Dre realises that his relationship with each of his parents has changed since they got married. Meanwhile, Bow surprises Jack and Diane with a new car and teaches them how to drive. (TV Show - Comedy)

During Christmastime, the first responders deal with cases that involve a runaway luggage handler, a woman whose skin has turned blue and a shopper who has been pushed over the edge. (TV Show - Drama)

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: In Outdoor Man's annual chilli cook-off, Mike competes and solicits Jen's help. In the meantime, Ryan and Kyle replace Kristin and Mandy at Vanessa's weekly lunch. (TV Show - Sitcom)

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: Jen discovers Vanessa's letter announcing that she is dropping out of the state assembly race. Later, Mandy and Mike go to extreme measures to help Vanessa connect with voters. (TV Show - Sitcom)

programme.title: Black-ish
programme.desc: A conversation with Bow compels Dre to tackle some life goals he previously gave up on. Meanwhile, Junior fears Olivia might break up with him over her deal-breakers in relationships. (TV Show - Comedy)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Beverly learns an interesting fact about Murray that makes her want to redo his 50th birthday party. Meanwhile, Adam prepares for the sport of pickleball with Coach Mellor. (TV Show - Sitcom)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Geoff keeps his living arrangement with Erica and Barry a secret from Beverly. Meanwhile, Adam tries to learn how to be cool in order to woo a girl in his chemistry class. (TV Show - Sitcom)

programme.title: Black-ish
programme.desc: Feeling stifled at Stevens and Lido, Dre decides to make some big career changes. Meanwhile, Boyz II Men help the team with a pitch, and the twins outstay their welcome at Junior's apartment. (TV Show - Comedy)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: A mistake at the launderers lands Homer in an asylum, where he befriends a man claiming to be Michael Jackson. Meanwhile, Bart promises to give Lisa the best birthday present. (TV Show - Animation)
The team responds to calls that involve a flight instructor hanging from an airplane, a bank teller who has been run over by a tractor and a man with a throat injury. (TV Show - Drama)

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: Mike and Vanessa secretly invite Jen's father to her graduation. However, Jen ends up struggling with accepting his new girlfriend, Fiona, who comes along with him. (TV Show - Sitcom)

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: After an article highlighting the car restoration business is published, Joe feels unappreciated because Chuck, Ed and Mike get more attention. (TV Show - Sitcom)

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: After another loss, Rick struggles. Michonne remains suspicious of the Governor as he throws a party with a unique twist for the people of Woodbury. (TV Show - Horror)

programme.title: Oblivion
programme.desc: A veteran who is assigned to extract Earth's remaining resources, begins to question his mission. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Movie In Focus
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes program that includes the making and a chat with the cast and crew of the movie. (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: The Mummy
programme.desc: In this reboot of the 'The Mummy' franchise, Sergeant Nick Morton and Corporal Chris Vail uncover the mummy of the betrayed Princess Ahmanet, who unleashes mayhem across London in a bid to reclaim her destiny. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Hills Have Eyes 2
programme.desc: It is the last day of training for the National Guard trainees. Little do they know about their upcoming battle against deadly mutants. (Film - Horror)

programme.title: Captain America: Civil War
programme.desc: The Avengers stand on opposite sides when world leaders try to interfere with their activities. With the two superhero factions--led by Captain America and Iron Man--pit against each other, are the Avengers doomed. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Percy Jackson: Sea Of Monsters
programme.desc: Percy Jackson, the son of Posedion, decides to uphold Thalia's sacrifice. Thalia had sacrificed herself to get the others into her camp and her father Zeus found another way for her to live by transforming her into a pine tree, creating a magical border around the camp so that no other half-blood would suffer from a fate as she did. For this, he embarks on a journey, with his friends Annabeth, Clarisse and half-brother, Tyson, to the Sea of Monsters to find the Golden Fleece which has the power to save their home and training ground, Camp Half-Blood. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Frozen
programme.desc: When the Snow Queen Elsa accidentally puts the kingdom in a state of infinite winter, Anna, her sister, teams up with Kristoff, an iceman, his loyal reindeer and Olaf, a snowman, to convince her to return and reverse the weather. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Iron Man 2
programme.desc: (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Incredibles
programme.desc: Forced to adopt a civilian identity and stuck in a white-collar job, Mr Incredible itches to get back into action. When he is lured into a trap by the evil Syndrome, his family contrives to save him. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: MasterChef Australia
programme.desc: The contestants compete against Jenna North and her crew, who choose the Eastern pantry, leaving the European pantry to the others. (TV Show - Reality - Talent)

programme.title: Cars 3
programme.desc: The third film in this animation franchise follows Lightning McQueen, who enlists the help of race technician Cruz Ramirez to get back in the racing game after the rise of a younger, faster generation of racers. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Monster Hunt 2
programme.desc: (Film - Adventure)

programme.title: League of Gods
programme.desc: (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Universal Soldier
programme.desc: (Film - Action)

programme.title: Filler
programme.desc: (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Undisputed III: Redemption
programme.desc: (Film - Action)

programme.title: Toy Story
programme.desc: In Andy's absence, his toys come to life and engage in a discussion. Woody, Andy's favourite cowboy doll, is worried that after Andy's birthday, wherein his mother would gift him a new toy, Buzz Lightyear, his importance may get reduced. He thus hatches a plan to eliminate Buzz, but they both end up fighting at a gas station and are left behind as Andy drives away. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Upgrade
programme.desc: After he is paralysed and his wife is killed in a brutal attack, Grey Trace, a technophobe, is approached by Eron, a billionaire, to implant an AI chip in his body to help him become mobile. This artificial intelligence called STEM bestows Grey with heightened senses and abilities and leads him to avenge the death of his wife. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Goal! The Dream Begins
programme.desc: Santiago always had a dream of playing professional soccer but couldn't do much about it. He started following his father's footsteps and started supporting the family, until a life changing opportunity strikes him. (Film - Drama)

programme.title: The Sorcerer's Apprentice
programme.desc: An average-looking Dave (Jay Baruchel) is recruited as an apprentice by master sorcerer Balthazar Blake (Nicholas Cage). Together, they must save Manhattan from Blake's arch-nemesis Maxim Horvath. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Pacifier
programme.desc: Vin Diesel dons the role of an FBI agent who is allotted the most bizarre assignment of his life in this rib-tickling and enthralling film. Unable to save a brilliant scientist from enemy forces, Vin is tasked with protecting his family, which includes his wife, four children, an infant and a pet duck. Armed with sippers, baby carriers and his guns he must make sure he can don the role of 'The Pacifier' in the tumultuous course of events. (Film - Family)

programme.title: Pirates Of The Caribbean: At World's End
programme.desc: Director Gore Verbinski and his crew set sail into the third chapter of this surreal, action-packed series that narrates the adventures of Captain Jack Sparrow (Johnny Depp). This installation finds Captain Sparrow stuck in Davy Jones' locker after his encounter with the kraken. Now Elizabeth Swann (Keira Knightley) and Will Turner (Orlando Bloom) must team up with the notorious Captain Barbossa (Geoffrey Rush) and pirates from around the world to save Jack Sparrow and fight the evil East India Trading Company. (Film - Adventure)

programme.title: Honey, I Shrunk the Kids
programme.desc: The film, which is a directorial debut of Joe Johnston, tells the story of an absent-minded inventor who leaves his latest creation, an electromagnetic shrinking machine, unattended in his attic. The machine shrinks his and his neighbour's kids to 1/4-th of an inch, when they accidentally trigger it. When the newly tiny youngsters are tossed out with the trash, they must survive the long journey across the lawn. (Film - Family)

programme.title: MasterChef Australia
programme.desc: The chefs from Stokehouse give the contestants a run for their money as they put their reputation and best dishes on the line. (TV Show - Reality - Talent)

programme.title: The Bourne Legacy
programme.desc: The US Department of Defense, which runs covert operations, offers stimulants to its field operatives for better results. When discovered, an English reporter plans to expose these secret activities. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Inglourious Basterds
programme.desc: Keeping with his famous trend of aestheticizing violence, Quentin Tarantino brings a war film starring Brad Pitt, Christoph Waltz and Melanie Laurent. Set in the backdrop of World War II, 'Inglourious Basterds' traverses the scheming and plotting of two groups that aim to assassinate prominent Nazi political leaders. But a single night changes the fate of everyone involved when the two groups cross each other's paths. (Film - War)

programme.title: Wreck-It Ralph
programme.desc: Ralph is tired of playing the role of a bad guy and embarks on a journey to become a video game hero. But Ralph accidentally lets loose a deadly enemy that threatens the entire arcade. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Guardians Of The Galaxy
programme.desc: Peter Quill, kidnapped from the earth by space pirates while he was still a child, escapes from the planet Morag, carrying with him a mysterious yet valuable orb and, as a result, is followed closely by the assassin of Ronan the Accuser who wants it for himself. Quill knows that he cannot take on Ronan alone in a battle in space, so he decides to put together a team of brave and heroic individuals with superpowers, calling them the Guardians of the Galaxy. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Movie In Focus
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes program that includes the making and a chat with the cast and crew of the movie. (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Monster Hunt
programme.desc: (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Incredibles 2
programme.desc: When Elastigirl is called by Devtech to work on a project to change the public's perception towards superheroes, Mr Incredible is left in charge of the household. But looking after Dash, who is having trouble at school, Violet, who becomes withdrawn after her break-up, and baby Jack-Jack's ever-increasing array of abilities is a daunting task in itself. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: The Mummy
programme.desc: In this reboot of the 'The Mummy' franchise, Sergeant Nick Morton and Corporal Chris Vail uncover the mummy of the betrayed Princess Ahmanet, who unleashes mayhem across London in a bid to reclaim her destiny. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Ratatouille
programme.desc: Remy, a rat, aspires to become a chef, oblivious to the fact that the profession is phobic to rodents. But the ambitious creature partners with garbage boy Linguini and the duo set a fine-dining restaurant in Paris ablaze with their culinary skills. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Titanic
programme.desc: Seventeen-year-old Rose, who hails from an aristocratic family, boards the ill-fated RMS Titanic and falls in love with Jack Dawson, a poor artist, much to the dismay of her mother and fury of her fiance. (Film - Romance)

programme.title: Baby's Day Out
programme.desc: Director Patrick Read Johnson's adventurous family comedy 'Baby's Day Out' narrates the story of three wannabe kidnappers, Eddie (Joe Mantegna), Norby (Joe Pantoliano) and Veeko (Brian Haley) disguise themselves as photographers, enter a huge mansion and make away with Baby Bink (Adam and Jacob Worton), millionaires Bennington (Matthew Glave) and Laraine (Lara Flynn Boyle) Cotwell's son. But Baby Bink turns out to be more than a hand full for the crooks. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: MasterChef Australia
programme.desc: The chefs from Stokehouse give the contestants a run for their money as they put their reputation and best dishes on the line. (TV Show - Reality - Talent)

programme.title: Boyka: Undisputed IV
programme.desc: After he accidentally kills his opponent, underground fighter Yuri Boyka questions everything he stands for and tries to win the freedom of the dead man's wife through a series of fights. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Fast & Furious 8
programme.desc: (Film - Action)

programme.title: Cars
programme.desc: A big league racing car, Lightning McQueen, learns an important lesson in life when he rams into the pavements of Radiator Springs and is ordered to repave the roads again. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Filler
programme.desc: (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Enchanted
programme.desc: The movie, part animation part live action, starring Amy Adams as a fairytale princess stuck in modern-day New York, embodies the best traditions of Disney. It depicts the life of a princess from the land of Andalasia, who is thrust into the heart of New York City by an evil queen. Soon after her arrival, Princess Giselle begins to change her views on life and love after meeting a handsome lawyer. Can a storybook view of romance survive in the real world. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide To The Galaxy
programme.desc: Arthur Dent has just lost his perfect woman to another and as if that wasn't enough, his friend, who actually turns out to be an alien, informs him about Earth's impending doom. Soon, Arthur is whisked away from Earth seconds before it is exploded to make way for a new hyperspace motorway. Plus, there are other woes such as being wanted by the police, Earth II, an insane electronic encyclopaedia, the absences of tea and so on and so forth. But, Arthur's day is not entirely lost because he now stands a chance to win back his lady love while being on the greatest adventure off Earth. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Incredibles 2
programme.desc: When Elastigirl is called by Devtech to work on a project to change the public's perception towards superheroes, Mr Incredible is left in charge of the household. But looking after Dash, who is having trouble at school, Violet, who becomes withdrawn after her break-up, and baby Jack-Jack's ever-increasing array of abilities is a daunting task in itself. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Enchanted
programme.desc: The movie, part animation part live action, starring Amy Adams as a fairytale princess stuck in modern-day New York, embodies the best traditions of Disney. It depicts the life of a princess from the land of Andalasia, who is thrust into the heart of New York City by an evil queen. Soon after her arrival, Princess Giselle begins to change her views on life and love after meeting a handsome lawyer. Can a storybook view of romance survive in the real world. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: TRON: Legacy
programme.desc: Sam misses his father, a virtual world designer, and enters a virtual space that has become much more dangerous than his father intended. Now, both father and son embark upon a life-and-death journey. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Planes
programme.desc: Dusty, a cropduster dreams of becoming a great air racer. Along with his friend, Chug, a fuel truck, Dusty practises flying manoeuvres, in order to qualify for the Wings Across the World race. A night before the qualifiers, Dusty asks Skipper, an old navy war plane, for assistance. Skipper refuses to help Dusty. The next day at the race, Dusty is laughed upon by the audience but manages to wow them with his smooth flying. He just manages to qualify for the main race. It is then that Skipper asks Dusty the reason he wants to participate in the race and satisfied with his answer, he decides to help Dusty. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2
programme.desc: The Guardians are hired by the Sovereign, an alien race, to retrieve their batteries, but Rocket ends up stealing them. In the chase that ensues, they're rescued by Peter's father, and he sets out to discover his parentage, only to reunite with his friends to save the galaxy once again. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Recruit
programme.desc: James Clayton, a young and promising CIA recruit, is hired by Walter Burke, his senior instructor, to find a sleeper agent who has infiltrated the agency. (Film - Thriller)

programme.title: Dracula Untold
programme.desc: Vlad the Impaler, a Transylvanian prince, is raised by the Turkish Empire to be an elite Janissary in the Sultan's special force. Having massacred thousands, Vlad's guilty conscience forces him to return to his kingdom. During one of his trips in the forest, Vlad and his soldiers enter an abandoned cave where they are attacked by a monster. Vlad escapes from the cave, into the sunlight, and the creature doesn't follow. On his return to the kingdom he is visited by Turkish emissaries who demand a tribute of 1000 boys who would be trained to become Janissaries like Vlad. Unwilling to fulfil the demand, Vlad meets the Turkish Sultan and offers himself against the boys but is rejected. With no other option left, Vlad turns to the devilish creature he had met before in the forest for help. (Film - Action)

programme.title: A Brush With Love
programme.desc: Jamie Spellman, the owner of an art school and a struggling painter, makes a painting for a competition. Later, she tries to find someone in her life who resembles the man in her painting. (Film - Tele Film)

programme.title: Frozen
programme.desc: When the Snow Queen Elsa accidentally puts the kingdom in a state of infinite winter, Anna, her sister, teams up with Kristoff, an iceman, his loyal reindeer and Olaf, a snowman, to convince her to return and reverse the weather. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Dracula Untold
programme.desc: Vlad the Impaler, a Transylvanian prince, is raised by the Turkish Empire to be an elite Janissary in the Sultan's special force. Having massacred thousands, Vlad's guilty conscience forces him to return to his kingdom. During one of his trips in the forest, Vlad and his soldiers enter an abandoned cave where they are attacked by a monster. Vlad escapes from the cave, into the sunlight, and the creature doesn't follow. On his return to the kingdom he is visited by Turkish emissaries who demand a tribute of 1000 boys who would be trained to become Janissaries like Vlad. Unwilling to fulfil the demand, Vlad meets the Turkish Sultan and offers himself against the boys but is rejected. With no other option left, Vlad turns to the devilish creature he had met before in the forest for help. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Pacific Rim: Uprising

But the rise of a new Kaiju threat finds him teaming up with his adoptive sister, Mako Mori, co-pilot Nate Lambert and 15-year-old Jaeger enthusiast Amara Namani to prevent a global catastrophe. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Based on the comic book series of the same name by the author Robert Kirkman, 'The Walking Dead' features the police officer Rick Grimes (Andrew Lincoln) who, along with his family and a bunch of other survivors, struggles to stay alive in a world ravaged by a zombie apocalypse. Some of the survivors, feeling overwhelmed by the pressure to stay alive, resort to barbaric behaviour, with Rick subsequently realising much to his dismay that the intense fear of the survivors can be more lethal than the zombies terrorising them. (TV Show - Horror)

programme.title: Ram Balram
programme.desc: Ram and Balram are 2 young boys who live with their loving parents. Their scheming uncle, Jagatpal, however kills the boy's father and mother. Jagatpal lies to the boys that their parents have been killed in an accident and promises to raise them himself. He enrolls the younger brother Balram, in school and eventually sends him off to join the police force. The older becomes a mechanic. Jagatpal has a tight hold on the boys, even when Ram is an adult, he still gives all his wages to his uncle and is only allowed to keep a few rupees for pocket money. (Action,Comedy,Drama)

programme.title: Showbiz
programme.desc: Rohan Arya lives a wealthy lifestyle in Mumbai and is a professional singer with Showbiz, which is managed by Inder Raj Bahl, while Rohan's personal Manager is Shikha Verma. Rohan and Shikha are attracted to each other, and after Journalist Sharad Rajpoot publishes their photographs, both publicly announce their forthcoming engagement. Then chaos enters their lives when Rohan's car is involved in an accident while he is in the company of a prostitute named Tara. Shikha refuses to have to do anything with him, while a frenzied media focuses in on Rohan's personal life - especially after word gets out that he may have known Tara before he met Shikha. (Action,Crime,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Pighalta Aasmaan
programme.desc: Delhi-based businesswoman Arti Singh Rathod lives a wealthy lifestyle along with Nanny, Suku, and friend and employee, Anuradha. She decides to travel to Kashmir and take possession of a piece of her land that is being occupied by Suraj Arora. Her Nanny tells her she was brought up by the Arora family until her dad, Karan Singh, became wealthy and broke off all relations with them. Once in Kashmir, all differences are forgotten and both Suraj and Arti fall in love with each other. Arti's life will soon change after she finds out that Anuradha, too, has fallen in love with Suraj, and this discovery will not only create complications and competitiveness between the two women, but also change everyone's lives forever. (Comedy,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Asmaan Se Ooncha
programme.desc: Action - A longstanding feud between bitter rivals yields an unexpected friendship in this tale of ambition, violence and love starring Jeetendra and Raj Babbar. Engaged in an ongoing dispute with his archenemy, Nagraj, a man named King sets out to kill the police officer who's interfered in his affairs. But through a remarkable twist of fate, King and the cop end up friends. Now, the two must face the formidable Nagraj -- who wants them both dead. - Ajitesh, Sadashiv Amrapurkar, Raj Babbar (Family,Action,Drama)

programme.title: Loha
programme.desc: A well-meaning but disgraced cop, is determined to fight a corrupt system, taking to task miscreants and criminals in his city. (Action)

programme.title: Daraar
programme.desc: Raj Malhotra lives with his mother, and comes from a very wealthy family. He meets Priya Bhatia, who works with a real estate agency, and instantly falls in love with her. (Thriller,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Insan
programme.desc: Amjad is a auto-rickshaw driver in Bombay, and lives with his mother in a small tenement in Bombay's slums. His mother had originally given birth to another son, Munna, who has been missing for several years. She is over-joyed when Munna returns home, and both she and Amjad welcome him, and celebrate. They do not know that Munna is now known as Azhar Khan - a member of a Jihaadi terrorist group, who is now using Amjad and his mother as a cover, in order to carry out a deadly and daring terrorist attack. (Drama,War)

programme.title: Mr. Natwarlal
programme.desc: Mr. Natwarlal is a 1979 Hindi Action comedy movie. Produced by Tony Glaad it is directed by Rakesh Kumar. Natwar is just a young boy when his beloved older brother and caretaker, police officer Gridharilal (Ajit), is framed for bribery by sinister criminal mastermind Vikram (Amjad Khan). When he grows up, Natwar (Amitabh Bachchan) creates a secret identity for himself, posing as a powerful and mysterious underworld figure named Mr. Natwarlal, determined to slowly but surely exact vengeance on Vikram. - via Wikipedia ( http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mr._Natwarlal ) (Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Nazar
programme.desc: Bombay Police are baffled when several bar girls and prostitutes are found brutally murdered by a scalpel.

programme.title: Teri Kasam
programme.desc: A spoiled rich girl falls for a poor aspiring musician. But after they marry, their egos and respective stubbornness cause them to drift apart. (Romance)

programme.title: Taqdeer Ka Tamasha
programme.desc: A single mother, Geeta, must deal with her two sons, the elder a Police Inspector Suryapratap; while the younger, Satya, a hoodlum, when both get into conflicts. Things only get worse after Satya gets arrested, arguments ensue and he leaves. He gets hired by Sheshnaag for the sole purpose of exacting vengeance against his rival, Deva. Both brothers are fated to meet again when Suryapratap decides to accumulate evidence to arrest Deva. Neither of the brothers know that Deva has an alias, and is determined to thwart any attempt for revenge nor face any charges under the Indian Penal Code. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: China Gate
programme.desc: After witnessing the brutal slaying of her Forest Officer father, Sunder Rajan, at the hands of dreaded dacoit Jageera, Sandhya goes to Colonel Krishnakant Puri and asks for his assistance in bringing an end to Jageera's rule in the Devdurg region. Krishnakant agrees to assist her, and summons about a dozen of his fellow officers and subordinates to assist him. They all assemble at Devdurg with all the necessary ammunitions and arms to combat Jageera, not realizing that Jageera has influence over the local police detachment, who will prevent Puri and his men to possess any guns and weapons. This does not deter Puri and his men, and they continue to stay on in Devdurg and gain the confidence of the villagers. What the villagers do not know that Krishnakant and his men had all been dishonorably discharged from the army for cowardice and retreating when attacked by the enemy. Will Puri and his men abandon Devdurg and let history repeat itself? (Action,Adventure,Drama,Thriller,Western)

programme.title: Aaj Ka Ravan
programme.desc: A series of unfortunate events plague journalist Shanti after a fellow journalist is shot to death on her doorstep

programme.title: Bewafaa
programme.desc: Anjali, living in Canada with her parents, hides her relationship to the musician Raja from her parents. When her sister dies during the birth of twins, she abandons her love, marries the widower Aditja and moves to New Delhi to become the new mother of her sister's children. Three years later, when Raja visits Delhi on his concert tour their love inflames again. (Drama)

programme.title: Keemat
programme.desc: Agent 116 Gopal (Dharmendra) is assigned the case to solve the mystery behind the missing of young women in Bombay. (Thriller,Action)

programme.title: Gunaah
programme.desc: Tough cop Prabha (Bipasha Basu) is haunted by the demons of her past. Being an illegitimate daughter of a prostitute, she has had a very bad childhood and there once occurred an incident in her life when she was driven to the point of committing a murder. But today, now that she is a cop, she believes that she can clear her conscience by reforming a criminal. Prabha's life is turned topsy-turvy with the entry of Aditya (Dino Morea), who is a good person at heart but was forced to take the path of crime due to the wrong doing of the system. Prabha goes to Aditya's house to nab him, but gets carried away when she sees him bathing. Aditya slips from under her vigilant eyes and a hasty chase follows. Prabha stays close on the heels of fleeing Aditya. At one point when she is about to fall off the rooftop Aditya stops running and extends his hand to save her. This act makes a great impact on Prabha. Prabha decides to know Aditya's past and find out what prompted him to commit crime in the first place. She decides to reform him but herself gets 'reformed' into loving him in the process. (Drama)

programme.title: Sultanat
programme.desc: After his wife dies in childbirth as the result of an unsuccessful coup attempt by the bandit Razoulli (Amrish Puri), Gen. Khalid (Dharmendra) vows to avenge her death in this Bollywood thriller. But as he prepares to carry out his plan against Razoulli's son (Sunny Deol) years later, little does Khalid know that the two are connected by a long-buried secret. Sridevi, Karan Kapoor and Juhi Chawla also star. (Action,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Krishna Arjun
programme.desc: Sharda Yadav is the widow of Ramnath, who was a freedom fighter. Now she lives a poor but very respectable lifestyle with her two sons, Krishna and Arjun, in a small rural town in India. Years pass by, Krishna and Arjun have both grown up. Krishna and his mom would like to send Arjun to Bombay to study and become a professional. Accordingly, Arjun travels to Bombay, where he resides in a hostel, meets a beautiful collegian named Punam, and both fall in love with each other. Then Arjun gets devastating news of the passing away of his mother. He travels home and finds that nothing is the same anymore, for Krishna has been arrested, found guilty of brutally raping and then killing a young school-teacher widow by the name of Meera, and unable to bear this shock of this disgrace, his mother has passed away. Arjun must now meet with Krishna and find out what had happened after he left town, and whether there is any truth to Krishna's crime.

programme.title: Mela
programme.desc: Roopa, a beautiful young village belle is much loved by the villagers of Chandanpur. Chandanpur celebrates a huge Mela every year and this year, they invite a Minister to inaugurate it. In an assassination attempt that follows, a massacre takes place. Chandanpur is devastated and Roopa's family gets wiped out. She vows revenge. Into her life enter two men, the gregarious Kishan and the volatile Shankar, causing much upheaval in their relationship. (Action,Drama)

programme.title: Veer
programme.desc: Circa 1920 British India, Pindari leader, Prithvi Singh, narrates his story to a Report from London Times about betrayal and deceit at the hands of the British and Madhavgarh's Raja Gyanendra Singh which led to the massacre of 4500 Pindaris. Although Prithvi sliced off Gyanendra's right arm, he has sworn to avenge and behead him and two-faced Britishers - who on one hand preach about Justice, Fraternity and Equality, but conquer and rule vulnerable natives - fueling hate and division on lines of religion, and caste. He sends his sons, Veer Pratap and Poonam, to Britain to learn about their devious ways, so that he can conquer Madhavgarh. The duo, despite of Lord Macaulay's malicious policy to convert foreign nationals to his way of thinking, not only pick up the relevant skills but also slay Yuvraj Sujan Singh, the only son of Gyanendra, much to the joy of the Pindaris. (Action)

programme.title: Dhadkan
programme.desc: Dhadkan is about Anjali (Shilpa Shetty) who is a girl that hails from an extremely rich and influential family. Her father Mr. Chauhan (Kiran Kumar) is a renowned businessman and has many dreams for his daughter. But Anjali is in love with Dev (Sunil Shetty) who is very poor & often cannot even afford to clothe himself properly. Dev also loves Anjali, wants to marry her so has to meet her father. (Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Saaya
programme.desc: Tanya is a rich woman who is married to another rich man named Vinod. But their lives change by Vinod's death. Tanya than starts falling in love with a doctor named Akash. But Akash is in love with a woman named Maya and after some time gets married to her. But their marriage does not last long. Because, first Maya leaves him to travel to another part of India to help people who are sick; and then Akash receives news that she is dead. Tanya comes up to console Akash and hopes that he will now love, accept and marry her. But Akash does not do so, as he is still immersed in Maya's memories, and believes that Maya is still alive and calling out to him. Is Akash going out of his mind? (Horror,Mystery,Romance)

programme.title: Juaari
programme.desc: Vijay, a young man, resorts to gambling to free his lover, Shanti, whom Sanga holds captive, but he soon runs out of luck and gets arrested. (Family)

programme.title: 16 December
programme.desc: White collar crimes that drain the nation of precious foreign exchange is connected to the funding of international terrorism. The much-told Hollywood theme is retold in the Indian context with much needed technical wizadry. (Action,Thriller)

programme.title: Pehchaan
programme.desc: A convict by the name of Yogi Shankar is accused of sexual molestation in court. The Judge Jagdish Verma who is responsible for passing Jogi's sentence is well aware of Jogi's behavior as he was once Jogi's defense advocate. With no hesitation Jagdish Verma grant a seven years period of rigorous punishment to Jogi despite his pleadings. The Judge family consists of his wife Urmilla, sons Kunal and Karan Verma; on completion of his seven years sentence Jogi is released from jail and abducts Urmilla, finds out that she is pregnant, ensures that she gives birth to a baby girl Tina and then kills her. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Chaalbaaz
programme.desc: Twins separated at infancy are brought up differently. One weak, one strong. One day, they end up at each others house. Their life is not the same anymore. (Action,Comedy,Drama,Family,Musical,Thriller)

programme.title: Dhadkan
programme.desc: Dhadkan is about Anjali (Shilpa Shetty) who is a girl that hails from an extremely rich and influential family. Her father Mr. Chauhan (Kiran Kumar) is a renowned businessman and has many dreams for his daughter. But Anjali is in love with Dev (Sunil Shetty) who is very poor & often cannot even afford to clothe himself properly. Dev also loves Anjali, wants to marry her so has to meet her father. (Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Inteha
programme.desc: Tina Saxena lives a wealthy life-style with her widowed businessman dad. One day, all of a sudden, she gets a nasty shock when her dad informs her that he had a mistress before he was married to her mother, and that this affair had resulted in the birth of a daughter, Nandini. Much to Tina's distaste, he invites Nandini to live with them, and asks her to look after Tina after he passes away, as he has been ill for quite sometime. Mr. Saxena does pass away, leaving a grieving Tina and Nandini, with Tina still having nothing to do with her step-sister. Then a dashing young man, Ranbir Oberoi, enters Tina's life and it is love at first sight for them. Nandini also approves of him, and it looks like Tina has given up on her dislike for Nandini. After a few days, and a purse-snatching incident, Nandini counsels Tina that she should consider breaking up with Ranbir. Aghast at this sudden volte face. (Drama,Thriller)

programme.title: Karishma Kudrat Ka
programme.desc: Vijay is a simple-minded widower who lives in a small rural town in India with his unmarried sister, Radha; his son; and his widowed mom. Radha is soon to be married to Sub-Inspector Raj. One day Vijay witnesses a killing of a young child by notorious bandit Bhagad Singh, and chides him. As a result, Bhagad and his gang severely beat him up, and only spare his life after Vijay's mom begs them to forgive him. But Lala Dayaluram hires Bhagad to ensure that Vijay and his family leave the town, and when they refuse Vijay is abducted, severely beaten and left for dead. An escaped convict and killer named Karan, who happens to be Vijay's exact look-alike, sees the unconscious Vijay, and decides to assume his identity, stabs him, and throws him to his death from atop a cliff. Karan then goes to live with his family. The motive for Karan to live here is merely to hide under Vijay's name until the police give up their manhunt for him. No one really notices the change in Vijay. Karan starts to frequent the nearby brothel run by Kammobai, and soon realizes that he can make a lot of money by selling young women to her. His first target that he intends to lure to Kammobai is none other than Radha, Vijay's sister. This is just one of the destructive methods he intends to employ in his new identity and there is no one who can dare to suspect nor stop him. (Action,Drama)

Kumar's other passion is boxing, which Janki loathes, and hopes that he will give this up soon. When the Agnihotris bring home a woman named Ganga, and introduce her to Kumar as Janki's childhood friend, Kumar finds out that Ganga is his biological mother, and his father, Ajay Kumar, was the National Champion in boxing, who was killed by three men for refusing to lose a fight. While Janki is afraid that she is going her son to Ganga, Kumar has decided to avenge his biological's father's death by any means, little realizing that he may face the same fate his father did years ago. programme.title: Zulm-O-Sitam
programme.desc: Superintendent of Police Arun is a hardworking, honest and diligent police officer in Bombay. He has been assigned to lead the detail in charge of the state's Chief Minister's protection. Things do not go as planned, and the Chief Minister is killed. The police find evidence linking Arun with this killing, and have him arrested and imprisoned. Arun loudly claims he in innocent, but if he is innocent, who actually was involved in this killing? (Action,Drama)

programme.title: Kaali Topi Laal Rumaal
programme.desc: Vijay lives a poor lifestyle in India along with his widowed mom and brother, Raja. When their mom become seriously ill, they do not have money to pay for her medicines, Raja steals some money much to the chagrin of Vijay, who beats him and asks him to leave, but he is unable to save his mother. He decides to return the stolen money but finds the recipient, also named Vijay, has killed himself, leaving behind his near-destitute mother and a sister, Shalu. When told about her son's passing, the mother has a seizure and is hospitalized. When she recovers Vijay decides to not tell her about her son's passing and becomes her son instead. He joins the army and becomes a Commando. He single=handedly captures a terrorist, Master D.D., and holds him in a cell. Vijay then meets with Mohini and gets married to her. What Vijay does not know is that Master D.D. is but a mere pawn, the real kingpin behind this gang is an unknown assailant known only as Kaali Topi Laal Rumaal; that Raja, who has taken to petty crime as a career, is part of this gang and had accepted an assignment to abduct Shalu; and to complicate Vijay's life even more the Indian Army comes across evidence linking Mohini with D.D.'s gang. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Kaccha Limboo
programme.desc: The words Kaccha Limbo denotes a child who is not mature enough.The movie follows the trials and tribulations of 13 year old Shambu.His friends in school ostracize him for being obese calling him names. Despite his school problems, Shambu does have a loving and caring family. He does not seem to relate to his step father, who seems to have a highly sympathetic attitude. He has crush for a girl, who does seem to despise him for his looks. He continues talking to her as an anonymous another person on phone. Things take a turn for worse when he accidentally causes damage to Videocam of another student, for which he is asked to pay damages. On the same day his forging parental signatures in school diary is found out. He runs away from home and befriends few slum children. (Comedy,Family)

programme.title: Goosebumps
programme.desc: A teenager teams up with the daughter of young adult horror author R.L. Stine after the writer's imaginary demons are set free on the town of Madison, Delaware. (Adventure,Horror,Comedy)

programme.title: Goosebumps 2: Haunted Halloween
programme.desc: Two boys face an onslaught from witches, monsters, ghouls and a talking dummy after they discover a mysterious book by author R. L. Stine. (Adventure,Comedy,Fantasy,Family,Horror)

programme.title: Spyder
programme.desc: A surveillance expert who wants to help people comes across a foe who is the very definition of evil. Can he stop the man before he destroys everything? (Action,Sci-Fi,Thriller)

programme.title: Businessman 2
programme.desc: The movie starts with Karthik(Ram)who runs a multimillion-dollar company in Portugal living with his family. He meets another rich women Anushka (Sonal Chauhan) for a business deal. They both got engaged but karthik's family was disappointed of this proposal. One of the companies of Karthik gets in to trouble due to a case registered by Green Army headed by Divya (Rakul Preet)against his factory and he heads to India to sort out the issue. being engaged to Anushk, Karthik goes to an extent to impress Divya in an attempt of convincing her to withdraw the case.Karthik reveals his actual purpose of coming to India later as he is the son of Bhupathi's sister, who has been staying away from family for 25 years.Bhupati meets karthik for marriage proposal with Divya. Karthik then goes to her village to reunite the family against all odds and marry Divya. Eventually,karthik (Ram) reunites the family which were separated for 25 years and marries to Divya bringing Pandaga for the family (Romance,Drama,Family)

programme.title: Robot
programme.desc: Dr. Vasi (Rajnikanth) invents a super-powered robot, Chitti, in his own image. The scientific body, AIRD, that must approve the robot, declines it based on its not having emotions and the ability to make rational judgment. A sudden flash of lightning evokes emotions in the robot, and Chitti is seemingly ready for integration into the human world. Then, Chitti falls in love with Dr. Vasi's fiancée Sana (Aishwarya Rai) and turns on his creator. (Science Fiction,Comedy)

programme.title: Hello Charlie
programme.desc: Charlie, a simpleton daydreamer, currently a pizza delivery boy is tasked with driving his uncle's truck , Girnaar Express, to deliver a gorilla from Mumbai to the jetty at Diu. However, Charlie is unaware that Gorilla is disguised business tycoon MD Makwana, who is on the run after committing a multi-crore scam. (Adventure,Comedy)

programme.title: Haseena Maan Jaayegi
programme.desc: Wealthy Seth Amirchand (Kader Khan) has two good-for-nothing sons, Sonu (Sanjay Dutt), and Monu (Govinda). They spend their time comically attempting to extort money from their hapless dad. Amirchand decides that the best way to deal with them is to separate them; he sends Sonu to Goa, and Monu to Bombay. Sonu ends up with the Verma family in Goa, consisting of Gulzarilal (Anupam Kher), his unmarried sister, Santho (Aruna Irani), and daughters, Pooja (Pooja Batra) and Ritu (Karisma Kapoor). Sonu falls in love with Pooja, and calls upon Monu to act as his paternal uncle for match-making. Monu ends up falling for Ritu. Unknown to him, Santho has also developed a crush on him. To complicate matters even more, underworld don, Bhai (Ashish Vidyarthi) demands money from Amirchand, only to have Amirchand mock and ridicule him, thinking it is another prank by his sons, this is when the family realize that pranks can indeed turn deadly, with Bhai who has sworn to avenge this humiliation. (Action,Comedy)

programme.title: Gabbar is Back
programme.desc: A vigilante network taking out corrupt officials draws the notice of the authorities. (Drama,Action)

programme.title: Super Khiladi Returns
programme.desc: Thiruvilaiyaadal Aarambam (Tamil: திருவிளையாடல் ஆரம்பம்; English: 'The Divine Sport starts) is a 2006 Tamil comedy film directed by Boopathy Pandian and produced by Dr. Vimala Geetha. Dhanush and Shriya Saran play the lead roles, while Prakash Raj, Karunas and Saranya play other pivotal roles. The film, which had music composed by D. Imaan, was released on 17 December 2006 and won critical and commercial acclaim (Comedy,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Chirutha
programme.desc: Charan's father (Surya) witnesses 'Bhai' (Ashish Vidyarthi) murder a man so he tries to kill him and his wife. The father dies while the mother might survive, so the money to operate her requires Charan to sacrifice his freedom and go to jail on someone's behalf. 12 years later, he is in Bangkok working for a travel agency and in love with a spoilt rich brat Sanjana (Neha Sharma). She comes to Bangkok and his agency takes care of her tour. She falls for him too, but his real motive is revenge. (Action,Romance)

programme.title: Bol
programme.desc: Bol is a roller coaster of emotions, yet carries subtleties that make your heartbeat stop. Based in the heart of Lahore, the story takes place in a house full of daughters, with vibrancy of life, yet restrictions on blooming. It questions the worth of a human being, may it be a woman or a person born with a birth defect. It questions the authority of reproducing human beings into this world without taking responsibility of acknowledging their worth. Bol takes you through a journey into the life of this family experiencing their troubles, sufferings, resolves and high points. As family members take decision to solve their problems they step into deeper troubles. The complexity of their circumstances becomes a struggle of life and death. (Drama,Thriller)

programme.title: Neevevaro
programme.desc: As Kalyan, a blind chef and Vennela, who comes visiting him at his restaurant, fall in love and start making plans for their future, Vennela goes missing. Series of unexpected and shocking events follow. (Thriller,Romance)

programme.title: International Khiladi: The Iron Man
programme.desc: Young Amrita Goutham's parents bring home a poor and homeless boy from the streets of Hyderabad, and adopt him. Shortly thereafter her life is shattered when her parents are killed by this boy and she goes to live with her brother, and his wife. Years later, she has grown up, and has a niece, Aishwarya. While being chased by some goons, a male named Aditya, comes to her rescue, and she falls in love with him. Amidst nation-wide kidnappings taking place allegedly at the hands of one Kaiser, she soon finds out that Aditya is none other than the one who killed her parents and may have returned back into her family's life to kill all of them. (Action,Crime,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Betting Raja
programme.desc: 'Betting' Raj (Ram Charan Teja) is a local happy-go-lucky guy who makes his living by betting. He lives along with his adopted parents (M. S. Narayana and Sudha) who support his means of living. Tragedy strikes the family in the form of his father who is suffering from a liver ailment. Raj needs 20 lakhs for his father's liver transplant. As he is on the lookout for money, he is approached by James (Ajmal), whom he had already met at an earlier competition, with a betting challenge. James dares Raj to make Chaitra (Tamannaah Bhatia) fall in love, the daughter of powerful betting committee president Bellary (Mukesh Rishi). (Action)

programme.title: Hum Dil De Chuke Sanam
programme.desc: Indian-based traditional family of Pundit Darbar (Vikram Gokhale) gets a visit from Sameer Rafilini (Salman Khan), from Italy, who has come as a pupil to learn music and singing. Darbar and his family accept him. Sameer meets Nandini (Aishwarya Rai), Darbar's daughter, and both fall in love. But Darbar wants Nandini to wed Vanraj (Ajay Devgan), and has Sameer swear that he will leave India. (Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Mard Ki Zaban 2
programme.desc: Soukhyam is a 2015 Telugu romantic comedy film produced by V. Anand Prasad on Bhavya Creations banner and directed by A.S. Ravikumar Chowdary. Starring Gopichand, Regina Cassandra in the lead roles and music composed by Anup Rubens. (Action,Romance)

programme.title: Sanam Bewafa
programme.desc: Traditional rivals arise between two Pathan families who were at daggers drawn for many generations. Brought up with immense love and affection Rukhsar, a beautiful damsel is Fatehkhan's daughter. Rukhsar with a dear friend Kanchan and other friends go to a hill for an outing. As the luck would have it, Rukhsar gets attracted to Salman, the rider is Sherkhan's son. Sherkhan.....the eternal enemy of Fatehkhan. Love blossomed admist all adversities. On knowing the truth, Fatehkhan finds his wrath too much to control. On the other hand, Sherkhan is extremely happy to know that his son is in love with his worst enemy's daughter and promises Salman that he will get him married to Rukhsar. The marriage is settled after great difficulties. On the marriage occasion Fatehkhan places an incredible demand in Haque-Meher. Sherkhan is dumbfounded and shocked but gives in for his sons happiness... (Drama)

programme.title: Jeene Nahi Doonga
programme.desc: The film's story is similar to fantasy films like Yamaleela, Yamudiki Mogudu, Yamagola and Yamadonga. Bullet Raja (Ravi Teja) is a small time crook with a good heart. He bumps into Swetha (Taapsee Pannu) at a function and falls in love with her. But Swetha is already engaged to Harbour Babu (Sushant Singh), a powerful local goon. Harbour Babu hatches a plan to finish off Bullet Raja and he succeeds in his efforts. Bullet Raja heads to Yamalokam where he realises that his life has unjustly been terminated by Chitragupta (M. S. Narayana) and so he picks up a fight with Yamadharma Raja (Prabhu). A helpless Yamadharma Raja decides to send him back to earth into the body of Home Minister Ravindra (Ravi Teja), who is killed by his associates Balram (Sayaji Shinde), Shantaram (Avinash) and Pavitrananda (Raghu Babu). After Bullet Raja enters into Ravinder's body, he confronts his enemies and fulfills the wishes of his mother Parvathamma (Jayasudha) and his followers. (Drama)

programme.title: Dhammu
programme.desc: Ramachandra (NTR) - an orphan wants to helps out people and make enough bank balance so that he can settle in life by marrying a girl of his choice. He falls in love with Ashwini (Trisha) at the first sight. He comes to know that a royal family from a distant village are looking to adopt a youngster. Ramachandra approaches them and gets adopted. He goes to a village where there are faction fights between the royals of the two village. It is the turn of Ramachandra to kill the enemies so that his village gets justice and peace. The rest of the story is all about how differently Ramachandra achieves it. (Thriller)

programme.title: Ungli
programme.desc: A gang of friends decide to take justice into their own hands. (Comedy,Drama,Thriller)

programme.title: Red: The Dark Side
programme.desc: Neil Oberoi(Aftab Shifdasani), is a billionaire with a serious heart condition and is in need of a new heart. He finds a donor who has left behind the beautiful Anahita.(Celina Jaitley). They fall in love but the death of her husband has left the police baffled. They start to suspect Neil and Anahita's friend. He then falls in love with her and doesnt realise that she is betraying him and that she killed her husband. (Drama,Romance,Thriller)

programme.title: Friday The 13th
programme.desc: The 13th page of a mysterious book harbours evil. It gives rise to a series of devastating events as people who read it, get possessed by demonic spirits. (Horror)

programme.title: Andaz Apna Apna
programme.desc: Amar and Prem are two rivals who belonging to middle-class families with no scope of future advancement. Both individually, without the knowledge of the other decide to take matters into their hands and find ways to get rich quickly. Chaos and acrimony result when both find each other at loggerheads when both arrive to win the hand of the daughter of multi-millionaire Ram Gopal Bajaj amidst considerable upheavals when Shyam, the twin brother of Ram, decides to do away with Ram and assume his identity and thus take over the estate of the Bajaj family. (Drama,Comedy,Romance)

programme.title: Dhoom 2
programme.desc: In the second installment of the Dhoom series, Jai and Ali are back as the buddy cops on their toughest job so far. "Mr.A" is an international thief who has planned to steal a priceless artifact in Mumbai and the police have got to nab him. But Mr.A manages to steal the artifact and elude the police. He finds his match in Sunehri and they form a partnership. They move on to Rio for their next job, with Jai and Ali hot on their trail. Mr.A whose actual name is Aryan, and Sunehri are drawn towards each other but little does Aryan know of Sunehri's little secret. (Drama,Action,Thriller,Crime)

programme.title: Chowkidar
programme.desc: Shyam, son of a money lender, falls in love with a watchman's daughter, Radha. However, Gopal, a playboy, tries to create problems in their lives in an attempt to win Radha's love. (Drama)

programme.title: Filler
programme.desc: Entertainment-based programme. (Entertainment)

programme.title: Filler
programme.desc: Entertainment-based programme. (Entertainment)

programme.title: Pran Jaye Par Vachan Na Jaye
programme.desc: Raja Thakur (Sunil Dutt) is an outlaw who fights oppression and corruption in his own unique way. This Robin Hood like figure is a feared and respected figure among the villagers and when he attends a dance performance given by the famous dancer Janiya (Rekha), he finds himself attracted to her. He shows his feelings openly but this proves to be a hindrance to Janiya - people now consider her to be the exclusive property of the outlaw and fear to ask her to perform for them. A rival gang kidnaps Janiya and invoke the wrath of Raja Thakur. Now Raja Thakur will have to leave the rural area, where he rules, and go into an unknown territory, to deal with unknown gangsters, and he must do so in order to keep his word. (Action,Drama,Musical,Crime)

programme.title: Lovers
programme.desc: Mary lives a wealthy lifestyle near Panaji, Goa, along with her brother, David and his wife, Eliza, and studies in a Bombay college. When she returns home for the holidays, she is teased and molested by a group led by Viju which she resents. She is then taught to sing by none other than Viju's mother, and shortly thereafter both she and Viju fall in love much to the chagrin of Eliza, who is a devout Christian while Viju is a Hindu Brahman. Eliza does not inform David, as he is known to be abusive, so she warns Mary to keep away from Viju. Eliza makes arrangements for Mary to return to Bombay so that she can forget Viju. On the day of her departure Murphy's law prevails and Eliza and David on one hand, and Mary and Viju on the other hand face challenges that may shatter and change their lives forever. (Comedy,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Raja Bhaiya
programme.desc: Raja Bhaiya (Comedy)

programme.title: Naam
programme.desc: Janki Kapoor (Nutan) and her two sons (Ravi Kapoor and Vicky Kapoor) come from a poor middle class family, and have difficulties making ends meet. (Musical,Drama,Adventure,Crime,Family)

programme.title: Himmat Aur Mehnat
programme.desc: Nurse Jyoti gets hired by a wealthy male, Madan, wins his confidence, and is permitted to virtually run the entire household. When Madan's son, Vijay Kumar, returns from New York, he sexually molests then eventually marries her. Then differences arise between her and Madan, and despite of the birth of a son, escalate to the point when Madan and Vijay both accuse her of having an affair with another male, leaving her no choice but to leave the household. Vijay has a change of heart and goes to visit his son and estranged wife, but is shocked to find that they are not alone, and she has sired another son. (Action,Drama)

programme.title: Salaakhen
programme.desc: Kandivli-based Sachidanand Agnihotri is a honest school-teacher, who has always faced problems due to his honesty, first with Poornima School; then in a Government school, and now he has come forward to testify against the sexual assault and murder of a young woman from Worli. Sachidanand points an accusing finger at Nagesh, the son of prominent and influential Jaspal Rana. Sachidanand's family, which consists of his wife, Gayetri, and son, Vishal, attempt in vain to talk him out of testifying. The Police are forced to arrest Nagesh and hold him in a cell. Then the Police, headed by a corrupt Assistant Commissioner of Police, Kamble, attempt to intimidate Sachidanand and follow him everywhere on the pretext of protecting him. Sachidanand is literally driven out of his mind, and on the day of the testimony, Nagesh's lawyer, Ashok Pradhan, confuses him to such an extent that Sachidanand kills himself. Vishal, who is being held in prison for assaulting several policemen, breaks out, abducts Nagesh, and then kills Ashok Pradhan. When Kamble comes to Nagesh's rescue, Vishal kills both of them. He then hunts down Jaspal and eventually kills him. On the run from the Police, he recruits prominent advocate, Khurana, who defends him and gets him acquitted. After the acquittal, instead of thanking his lawyer, Vishal surprisingly kills him in open court. The question remains - what prevailed upon Vishal to kill his very own attorney - who had fought so hard to get his acquittal? (Action,Drama)

programme.title: Elaan - E - Jung
programme.desc: A small Indian village is terrorized by a terrorist Kalanag who wants to destroy the country and become its ruler.

programme.title: Salaakhen
programme.desc: Kandivli-based Sachidanand Agnihotri is a honest school-teacher, who has always faced problems due to his honesty, first with Poornima School; then in a Government school, and now he has come forward to testify against the sexual assault and murder of a young woman from Worli. Sachidanand points an accusing finger at Nagesh, the son of prominent and influential Jaspal Rana. Sachidanand's family, which consists of his wife, Gayetri, and son, Vishal, attempt in vain to talk him out of testifying. The Police are forced to arrest Nagesh and hold him in a cell. Then the Police, headed by a corrupt Assistant Commissioner of Police, Kamble, attempt to intimidate Sachidanand and follow him everywhere on the pretext of protecting him. Sachidanand is literally driven out of his mind, and on the day of the testimony, Nagesh's lawyer, Ashok Pradhan, confuses him to such an extent that Sachidanand kills himself. Vishal, who is being held in prison for assaulting several policemen, breaks out, abducts Nagesh, and then kills Ashok Pradhan. When Kamble comes to Nagesh's rescue, Vishal kills both of them. He then hunts down Jaspal and eventually kills him. On the run from the Police, he recruits prominent advocate, Khurana, who defends him and gets him acquitted. After the acquittal, instead of thanking his lawyer, Vishal surprisingly kills him in open court. The question remains - what prevailed upon Vishal to kill his very own attorney - who had fought so hard to get his acquittal? (Action,Drama)

programme.title: Anek
programme.desc: Madhumitha is convinced that she and her colleague Ashwin were lovers in their past lives and have been brought together by fate. Is there any truth to this or is she merely hallucinating? (Comedy,Mystery,Romance,Thriller)

programme.title: Nela Ticket
programme.desc: A carefree young man is forced to alter his life due to a shocking event that takes place in his life. He fights against an evil, corrupt politician to get justice for the society. (Action,Drama)

programme.title: Swamy Ra Ra
programme.desc: Nikhil plays the role of a pick-pocketer in this film (Action,Comedy)

programme.title: Daawat-e-Ishq
programme.desc: A deliciously romantic coming together of Gulrez “Gullu” Qadir (Parineeti Chopra) a Hyderabadi shoe-sales girl disillusioned with love because of her encounters with dowry-seeking men; and Tariq “Taru” Haidar (Aditya Roy Kapur) a Lucknawi cook who can charm anybody with the aroma and flavours of his biryani and kebabs. (Drama,Romance,Comedy)

programme.title: Kill Dil
programme.desc: The cast members speak about the plot and making of a movie and share their on-set experiences and behind-the-scenes footage. (Entertainment)

programme.title: Tashan
programme.desc: Jeetendra Kumar Makwana is employed full-time at a Call Center and works part-time teaching English. He is recruited by an attractive young woman, Pooja, to teach her Hinglish-speaking boss, Bhaiyaji, English. Jeetendra agrees to do so, falls in love with Pooja, and joins forces with her to steal a bag containing 25 Crore Rupees in cash. He will soon find out that Bhaiyaji is a hoodlum and extortionist known to the Police as Lakhan Singh. (Action,Comedy,Romance)

programme.title: Ghostbusters
programme.desc: Following a ghost invasion of Manhattan, paranormal enthusiasts Erin Gilbert and Abby Yates, nuclear engineer Jillian Holtzmann, and subway worker Patty Tolan band together to stop the otherworldly threat. (Action,Comedy,Fantasy)

programme.title: Sabse Bada Zero
programme.desc: Lucky, a young man, is handed a bag containing money stolen from a bank. The don who stole the money is in search of the person who robbed him and will do anything to retrieve the cash. (Comedy)

programme.title: Rambo Straight Forward
programme.desc: Santhu, a middle-class man, falls in love with Ananya, an architecture student. However, he realises that she is engaged to Dev, a gangster, and strives to win her over. (Drama)

programme.title: Tarzan The Heman
programme.desc: An Andaman tribal who escapes from men trying to capture his people, ends up in the care of a spoilt, rich girl, who starts to fall in love with him. (Action,Adventure)

programme.title: The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor
programme.desc: The third installment in the Mummy franchise takes archaeologist Rick O'Connell to China, pitting him against an emperor from the 2,000-year-old Han dynasty who's returned from the dead to pursue a quest for world domination. This time, O'Connell enlists the help of his family -- including his wife and son -- to quash the so-called Dragon Emperor and his abuse of supernatural power. (Adventure,Fantasy,Action,Thriller)

programme.title: WWE Super Dhamaal
programme.desc: Host Sahil Khattar presents the latest updates pertaining to WWE events along with major highlights and the best action from shows. (WWE/WWF)

programme.title: Pagalpanti
programme.desc: 3 men, considered as losers in their lives by the people, plan to get rich along with their girlfriends by fooling 2 gangsters and robbing their money. (Comedy,Action)

programme.title: ATM
programme.desc: Sigamani, a young man who had dropped out of school in his childhood, pretends to be a doctor in order to impress the woman he loves. (Comedy)

programme.title: Kill Dil
programme.desc: The cast members speak about the plot and making of a movie and share their on-set experiences and behind-the-scenes footage. (Entertainment)
